name: Closer Healing
desc: When healing an ally, increases healing output based on unit and ally's support rank.
components: target.get_max_hp() // 3 if get_support_rank(unit, target) == 'A' else target.get_max_hp() // 4 if get_support_rank(unit, target) == 'B' else target.get_max_hp() // 5 if get_support_rank(unit, target) == 'C' else 0
